mapper.select: select s.s_num, s_name from show s JOIN theater th ON s.th_num = th.th_num JOIN hall h ON th.th_num = h.th_num JOIN ticket_seat ts ON h.hall_id = ts.hall_id JOIN ticket t ON ts.pay_num = t.pay_num group by s.s_num, s_name order by s.s_num

select SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ti_regdate,'yyyymmdd'), 5, 2) AS stat_date
SUM(DECODE(s_num, ${item.s_num}, s_price, 0)) AS "s${item.s_num}"
from ( select SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ti_regdate,'yyyymmdd'), 1, 4) AS stat_year, s.s_num, s_name, s_price, s.th_num, u.u_id, t.pay_num, t.ti_regdate, ti_status from ( select s_num, s_name, s_price, th_num from show ) s JOIN theater th ON s.th_num = th.th_num JOIN hall h ON th.th_num = h.th_num JOIN ticket_seat ts ON h.hall_id = ts.hall_id JOIN ticket t ON ts.pay_num = t.pay_num JOIN q_user u ON t.u_id = u.u_id ) where ti_status = 1 group by SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ti_regdate,'yyyymmdd'), 5, 2) order by stat_date
